item.title: Create animations in .NET MAUI for a disco atmosphere
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: ‎ This post is part of a series (”My First App”). To ease your read, please start from the project containing all the different steps applied so far in this tutorial. To do so, refer to the project setup guide and resume from the sample located in the folder “5 - Music Player”. Welcome to the final episode of this series! ✌️ If you’ve followed the series so far, then you should have an app you can use to listen to a few music tracks.
